partOne.title: Acknowledging the Past, Sunsetting the Present
partOne.description: Learn how to responsibly transition away from extractive industries using the Hearthstone Protocol and Peace & Conflict Resolution Framework.

sunsetting.title: Sunsetting the Legacy System
sunsetting.subtitle: Applying the Hearthstone Protocol
sunsetting.description: How communities can engage with legacy industries and form Stewardship Trusts to manage asset transfers for regenerative purposes.

healing.title: Healing the Wounds
healing.subtitle: Using the Peace & Conflict Resolution Framework
healing.description: Implementing Truth and Reconciliation processes to acknowledge historical harms and create legally binding restorative actions.

partTwo.title: Building the Regenerative Future
partTwo.description: Discover how to create dignified work and economic stability during transition using Work in Liberation and AUBI frameworks.

empowering.title: Empowering the Workforce
empowering.subtitle: Implementing the Work in Liberation Framework
empowering.description: Creating Just Transition Service Corps and retraining workers for new roles in ecological restoration and renewable energy.

building.title: Building the New Economy
building.subtitle: Leveraging the AUBI Framework
building.description: Using universal baseline payments and regenerative rewards to provide stability and seed new worker cooperatives.

partThree.title: Synthesis & Vision
partThree.description: See the complete transformation in action and understand how to replicate this approach in any community.

case-study.title: Case Study in Full - The Ruhr Valley's 'Steel-to-Solar' Transition
case-study.subtitle: A Complete Ten-Year Transformation
case-study.description: A narrative walkthrough showing how one community used all four GGF frameworks to transform from declining industrial hub to thriving regenerative economy.

conclusion.title: A Replicable Blueprint for Hope
conclusion.subtitle: Your Community's Path Forward
conclusion.description: Summary of the integrated GGF approach and final call to action for communities seeking to move beyond extractive pasts.
